AI Description: spaCy is a free, open-source library for advanced Natural Language Processing (NLP) in Python. It is designed with the goal of facilitating easy implementation of state-of-the-art NLP techniques.
Core Features: Tokenization, Part-Of-Speech Tagging, Named Entity Recognition, Dependency Parsing, Sentence Segmentation, Word Vectors
General Tags: Nlp, Natural Language Processing, Python Library
